mapper.select: SELECT P.PRODUCT_NO , T.TYPE_NO , T.NAME AS T_NAME , P.NAME AS P_NAME , P.PRICE , P.DEGREE , P.CAPACITY , P.IMAGE , P.STORAGE , P.TASTE , P.APPETIZER , TO_CHAR (P.ENROLL_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS ENROLL_DATE , P.EXPIRY_DATE , P.DEL_YN FROM PRODUCT P JOIN TYPE T ON T.TYPE_NO = P.TYPE_NO ORDER BY PRODUCT_NO DESC OFFSET #{pageNo} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{limit} ROWS ONLY

SELECT P.PRODUCT_NO , T.TYPE_NO , T.NAME AS T_NAME , P.NAME AS P_NAME , P.PRICE , P.DEGREE , P.CAPACITY , P.IMAGE , P.STORAGE , P.TASTE , P.APPETIZER , TO_CHAR (P.ENROLL_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS ENROLL_DATE , P.EXPIRY_DATE , P.DEL_YN FROM PRODUCT P JOIN TYPE T ON T.TYPE_NO = P.TYPE_NO ORDER BY PRODUCT_NO DESC

SELECT P.PRODUCT_NO , T.TYPE_NO , T.NAME AS T_NAME , P.NAME AS P_NAME , P.PRICE , P.DEGREE , P.CAPACITY , P.IMAGE , P.STORAGE , P.TASTE , P.APPETIZER , TO_CHAR (P.ENROLL_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS ENROLL_DATE , P.EXPIRY_DATE , P.DEL_YN FROM PRODUCT P JOIN TYPE T ON T.TYPE_NO = P.TYPE_NO WHERE PRODUCT_NO = #{productNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PRODUCT(PRODUCT_NO, TYPE_NO, NAME, PRICE, DEGREE, CAPACITY, EXPIRY_DATE, STORAGE, TASTE, APPETIZER, IMAGE) VALUES(SEQ_PRODUCT_NO.NEXTVAL, #{typeNo}, #{pName}, #{price}, #{degree}, #{capacity}, #{expiryDate}, #{storage}, #{taste}, #{appetizer}, #{image})
mapper.update: UPDATE PRODUCT SET DEL_YN = #{delYn} WHERE PRODUCT_NO = #{productNo}
